languages.text: "Юношеству стоит выучить жизненный урок — приземлять седалище можно только на те троны, которые получил законно или завоевал безвозвратно".
"There is a life lesson every young man should learn: keep your backside off any throne you have not rightfully earned or irrevocably won."
languages.original_text: "Юношеству стоит выучить жизненный урок — приземлять седалище можно только на те троны, которые получил законно или завоевал безвозвратно".

traits.locale_text: "There is a life lesson every young man should learn: keep your backside off any throne you have not rightfully earned or irrevocably won."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "There is a life lesson every young man should learn: keep your backside off any throne you have not rightfully earned or irrevocably won."

traits.locale_text: "There is a life lesson every young man should learn: keep your backside off any throne you have not rightfully earned or irrevocably won."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “每个年轻人都应当牢记这条教训：不要坐上德不配位的宝座，不要炫耀岌岌可危的胜利。”
languages.original_text: "There is a life lesson every young man should learn: keep your backside off any throne you have not rightfully earned or irrevocably won."

traits.locale_text: “每个年轻人都应当牢记这条教训：不要坐上德不配位的宝座，不要炫耀岌岌可危的胜利。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « Ne vous asseyez pas sur un trône sur lequel vous n'avez aucune légitimité. Voilà une leçon que tout jeune homme devrait apprendre. »
languages.original_text: "There is a life lesson every young man should learn: keep your backside off any throne you have not rightfully earned or irrevocably won."

traits.locale_text: « Ne vous asseyez pas sur un trône sur lequel vous n'avez aucune légitimité. Voilà une leçon que tout jeune homme devrait apprendre. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Jeder junge Mann sollte eine Lektion fürs Leben lernen: Haltet Euren Hintern fern von jedem Thron, denn Ihr nicht rechtmäßig verdient oder unwiderruflich erobert habt."
languages.original_text: "There is a life lesson every young man should learn: keep your backside off any throne you have not rightfully earned or irrevocably won."

traits.locale_text: "Jeder junge Mann sollte eine Lektion fürs Leben lernen: Haltet Euren Hintern fern von jedem Thron, denn Ihr nicht rechtmäßig verdient oder unwiderruflich erobert habt."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「全青年が学ぶべき人生の教訓があるーー正当に勝ち取ってない玉座、または取り返しのつかない方法で勝ち取った玉座に背を向けてはならない」
languages.original_text: "There is a life lesson every young man should learn: keep your backside off any throne you have not rightfully earned or irrevocably won."

traits.locale_text: 「全青年が学ぶべき人生の教訓があるーー正当に勝ち取ってない玉座、または取り返しのつかない方法で勝ち取った玉座に背を向けてはならない」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «Hay una lección que todo joven debe aprender: no hay que sentarse en ningún trono que no se haya uno merecido o ganado de forma irrevocable».
languages.original_text: "There is a life lesson every young man should learn: keep your backside off any throne you have not rightfully earned or irrevocably won."

traits.locale_text: «Hay una lección que todo joven debe aprender: no hay que sentarse en ningún trono que no se haya uno merecido o ganado de forma irrevocable».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.original_text: "There is a life lesson every young man should learn: keep your backside off any throne you have not rightfully earned or irrevocably won."

languages.text: "Her delikanlının öğrenmesi gereken bir hayat dersidir: Bileğinin hakkıyla, elinden alınamaz şekilde kazanmadığın bir tahta yaslama ardını."
languages.original_text: "There is a life lesson every young man should learn: keep your backside off any throne you have not rightfully earned or irrevocably won."

traits.locale_text: "Her delikanlının öğrenmesi gereken bir hayat dersidir: Bileğinin hakkıyla, elinden alınamaz şekilde kazanmadığın bir tahta yaslama ardını."
